metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22576 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An improper authentication vulnerability exists in curl 7.33.0 to and including 7.82.0 which might allow reuse OAUTH2-authenticated connections without properly making sure that the connection was authenticated with the same credentials as set for this transfer. This affects SASL-enabled protocols: SMPTP(S), IMAP(S), POP3(S) and LDAP(S) (openldap only).

criterions.comment: curl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not-in-code').
